includedAssets.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
includedAssets.synopsis: Two decades after creating the Star Wars universe, George Lucas returns to the beginning with the first chapter of Anakin Skywalker's epic transformation from promising young Jedi into pan-galactic scourge, Darth Vader. As a gifted youngster, Anakin (Jake Lloyd) is schooled in the Jedi arts by wise master Qui-Gon Jinn (Liam Neeson) and his apprentice Obi Wan Kenobi (Ewan McGregor). But he becomes an important pawn in the power struggle between the Jedi and their dark counterparts, the Sith, when both sides of the Force converge on the planet Naboo and its young queen Amidala (Natalie Portman). With much backstory to cover, Phantom Menace punctuates the intrigue with bags of action while unleashing one of the story's most memorable characters in the double-sabred devil Darth Maul.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Two Jedi Knights (Ewan McGregor and Liam Neeson) discover a boy who may bring balance to the Force just as the evil Sith resurface.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Two decades after creating the Star Wars universe, George Lucas returns to the beginning with the first chapter of Anakin Skywalker's epic transformation from promising young Jedi into pan-galactic scourge, Darth Vader. As a gifted youngster, Anakin (Jake Lloyd) is schooled in the Jedi arts by wise master Qui-Gon Jinn (Liam Neeson) and his apprentice Obi Wan Kenobi (Ewan McGregor). But he becomes an important pawn in the power struggle between the Jedi and their dark counterparts, the Sith, when both sides of the Force converge on the planet Naboo and its young queen Amidala (Natalie Portman). With much backstory to cover, Phantom Menace punctuates the intrigue with bags of action while unleashing one of the story's most memorable characters in the double-sabred devil Darth Maul.

includedAssets.title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack Of The Clones
includedAssets.synopsis: As he nears adulthood, aspiring Jedi Anakin Skywalker (Hayden Christensen) struggles to control his dark side despite the best efforts of his mentor Obi-Wan Kenobi (Ewan McGregor) and the affections of young senator Padme (Natalie Portman). Although his mastery of the Force increases, Anakin's volatile nature puts the Republic at risk, especially as scheming Sith lord Count Dooku (Christopher Lee) is engineering a war that could deliver the galaxy into the hands of evil. The saga storms onwards with more action, more skulduggery, and more pearls of Jedi wisdom from Yoda and Samuel L Jackson as his fellow guru Mace Windu.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A Jedi Knight (Ewan McGregor) and his young apprentice (Hayden Christensen) battle to protect the Republic from separatist leader Count Dooku.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As he nears adulthood, aspiring Jedi Anakin Skywalker (Hayden Christensen) struggles to control his dark side despite the best efforts of his mentor Obi-Wan Kenobi (Ewan McGregor) and the affections of young senator Padme (Natalie Portman). Although his mastery of the Force increases, Anakin's volatile nature puts the Republic at risk, especially as scheming Sith lord Count Dooku (Christopher Lee) is engineering a war that could deliver the galaxy into the hands of evil. The saga storms onwards with more action, more skulduggery, and more pearls of Jedi wisdom from Yoda and Samuel L Jackson as his fellow guru Mace Windu.

includedAssets.title: Star Wars: Episode III: Revenge Of The Sith
includedAssets.synopsis: George Lucas's space opera reaches a mighty crescendo in the trilogy-binding episode that sees Anakin Skywalker (Hayden Christensen) complete his transition to the Dark Side. As the Clone Wars scatter the Jedi to all corners of the galaxy, Anakin is still key to their cause. But poisonous thoughts and fears for his pregnant wife Padme (Natalie Portman) are not only changing his allegiances, but his very soul... Battles rage, friendships are tested and revelations abound in the darkest chapter since the Empire struck back.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Anakin Skywalker becomes closer with Chancellor Palpatine and begins to succumb to the temptations of the dark side. Epic sci-fi adventure.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: George Lucas's space opera reaches a mighty crescendo in the trilogy-binding episode that sees Anakin Skywalker (Hayden Christensen) complete his transition to the Dark Side. As the Clone Wars scatter the Jedi to all corners of the galaxy, Anakin is still key to their cause. But poisonous thoughts and fears for his pregnant wife Padme (Natalie Portman) are not only changing his allegiances, but his very soul... Battles rage, friendships are tested and revelations abound in the darkest chapter since the Empire struck back.

includedAssets.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
includedAssets.synopsis: Whisking us to a galaxy far, far away, George Lucas' sci-fi vision tells the story of Luke Skywalker (Mark Hamill), a farm boy from a forgotten planet who becomes a key figure in the rebellion against the evil Empire that threatens to sweep the universe. Aided by an old Jedi mentor (Alec Guinness), Luke sets out on an adventure that sees him befriend robots, royalty and a menagerie of rogues on his way to confronting the darkest forces in the universe. Essentially taking a traditional western and setting it in space, Lucas blew the movie world away with a supernova of exhilarating action, unforgettable characters, and ground-breaking special effects.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Luke Skywalker joins forces with Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi and cocky pilot Han Solo to rescue the beautiful Princess Leia from the Empire.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Whisking us to a galaxy far, far away, George Lucas' sci-fi vision tells the story of Luke Skywalker (Mark Hamill), a farm boy from a forgotten planet who becomes a key figure in the rebellion against the evil Empire that threatens to sweep the universe. Aided by an old Jedi mentor (Alec Guinness), Luke sets out on an adventure that sees him befriend robots, royalty and a menagerie of rogues on his way to confronting the darkest forces in the universe. Essentially taking a traditional western and setting it in space, Lucas blew the movie world away with a supernova of exhilarating action, unforgettable characters, and ground-breaking special effects.

includedAssets.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
includedAssets.synopsis: Taking the saga to the furthest reaches of hyperspace, the second chapter of George Lucas's space odyssey sees Luke Skywalker plunge into battle on the ice planet of Hoth before resuming his Jedi training under the eye of the deceptive ancient master Yoda. But as Darth Vader and the Empire regroups, loyalty and trust are in short supply... as Han Solo (Harrison Ford) discovers on the floating city of Bespin. The Force continues to grow stronger in a breath-taking sequel that boasts one of the biggest climactic revelations in movie history.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Luke Skywalker studies the Force under Jedi master Yoda, Darth Vader pursues Han Solo and Princess Leia.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Taking the saga to the furthest reaches of hyperspace, the second chapter of George Lucas's space odyssey sees Luke Skywalker plunge into battle on the ice planet of Hoth before resuming his Jedi training under the eye of the deceptive ancient master Yoda. But as Darth Vader and the Empire regroups, loyalty and trust are in short supply... as Han Solo (Harrison Ford) discovers on the floating city of Bespin. The Force continues to grow stronger in a breath-taking sequel that boasts one of the biggest climactic revelations in movie history.

includedAssets.title: Star Wars: Episode Vi - Return Of The Jedi
includedAssets.synopsis: The original Star Wars trilogy comes to a rip-roaring climax, beginning with a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from the clutches of space gangster Jabba the Hutt. But there's no rest for the rebels as the Empire has begun work on a second Death Star near the forest moon of Endor. As the Alliance prepares for a battle that will decide the fate of the galaxy, trainee Jedi Luke Skywalker must face Darth Vader once again in a confrontation that pushes him perilously close to the Dark Side. Never mind the Ewoks, this is a fittingly spectacular finale to the greatest sci-fi saga of all time.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Empire and the Rebel Alliance prepare for a final stand-off as Luke Skywalker confronts Darth Vader.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The original Star Wars trilogy comes to a rip-roaring climax, beginning with a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from the clutches of space gangster Jabba the Hutt. Never mind the Ewoks, this is a fittingly spectacular finale to the greatest sci-fi saga of all time.

includedAssets.title: Star Wars: Six Movie Collection
includedAssets.synopsis: George Lucas's epic space opera following the incredible rise and tragic fall of Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and the redemptive journey of his son, Luke, as he sets out to destroy the evil Empire and bring balance to the Force. Iconic sci-fi saga starring Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness and Ewan McGregor.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: George Lucas's epic space opera following the rise and fall of Jedi Anakin Skywalker and the journey of his son, Luke. Iconic sci-fi saga.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: George Lucas's epic space opera following the incredible rise and tragic fall of Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and the redemptive journey of his son, Luke, as he sets out to destroy the evil Empire and bring balance to the Force. Iconic sci-fi saga starring Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness and Ewan McGregor.
